thread.title: Cardinals bracing for Game 3 of NLDS against Arrieta, Cubs
thread.title_full: Cardinals bracing for Game 3 of NLDS against Arrieta, Cubs

author: JAY COHEN
title: Cardinals bracing for Game 3 of NLDS against Arrieta, Cubs
text:
Nam Y. Huh Cardinals bracing for Game 3 of NLDS against Arrieta, Cubs 
Chicago Cubs pitcher Jake Arrieta talks with teammates before an NLDS baseball practice on Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015, in Chicago. The Cubs are to face the St. Louis Cardinals in Game 3 of the National League Division Series on Monday. (AP Photo/Nam Y. Huh) Nam Y. Huh Cardinals bracing for Game 3 of NLDS against Arrieta, Cubs 
Chicago Cubs pitcher Jake Arrieta attends an NLDS baseball practice on Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015, in Chicago. The Cubs are to face the St. Louis Cardinals in Game 3 of the National League Division Series on Monday. (AP Photo/Nam Y. Huh) Nam Y. Huh Cardinals bracing for Game 3 of NLDS against Arrieta, Cubs 
Chicago Cubs' Addison Russell catches a ball during an NLDS baseball practice on Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015, in Chicago. The Cubs are to face the St. Louis Cardinals in Game 3 of the National League Division Series on Monday. (AP Photo/Nam Y. Huh) Posted: Sunday, October 11, 2015 4:17 pm | Updated: 6:00 pm, Sun Oct 11, 2015. Cardinals bracing for Game 3 of NLDS against Arrieta, Cubs Associated Press | 0 comments 
CHICAGO (AP) — St. Louis manager Mike Matheny says the Cardinals are preparing for Game 3 of the NL Division Series in "the same boring way" they have all season long. 
The Cardinals and the Chicago Cubs are tied at one game apiece heading into the first playoff game at Wrigley Field in seven years. Oh, the Cubs also will have Jake Arrieta on the mound on Monday night for his first start since he shut out Pittsburgh in the wild-card game. kAm|2E96?J D2JD E96 r2C5:?2=D 92G6 366? 4@F?E65 @FE 367@C6 282:?DE 246 A:E496CD :?
